00040 #ifndef PMEMOBJ_SPECIALIZATION_HPP
00041 #define PMEMOBJ_SPECIALIZATION_HPP
00042 
00043 #include <memory>
00044 
00045 namespace nvml
00046 {
00047 
00048 namespace detail
00049 {
00050 /* smart pointer specialization */
00051 
00052 template <typename T>
00053 struct sp_element {
00054         typedef T type;
00055 };
00056 
00057 template <typename T>
00058 struct sp_element<T[]> {
00059         typedef T type;
00060 };
00061 
00062 template <typename T, std::size_t N>
00063 struct sp_element<T[N]> {
00064         typedef T type;
00065 };
00066 
00067 /* sp_dereference is a return type of operator* */
00068 
00069 template <typename T>
00070 struct sp_dereference {
00071         typedef T &type;
00072 };
00073 
00074 template <>
00075 struct sp_dereference<void> {
00076         typedef void type;
00077 };
00078 
00079 template <>
00080 struct sp_dereference<void const> {
00081         typedef void type;
00082 };
00083 
00084 template <>
00085 struct sp_dereference<void volatile> {
00086         typedef void type;
00087 };
00088 
00089 template <>
00090 struct sp_dereference<void const volatile> {
00091         typedef void type;
00092 };
00093 
00094 template <typename T>
00095 struct sp_dereference<T[]> {
00096         typedef void type;
00097 };
00098 
00099 template <typename T, std::size_t N>
00100 struct sp_dereference<T[N]> {
00101         typedef void type;
00102 };
00103 
00104 /* sp_member_access is a return type of operator-> */
00105 
00106 template <typename T>
00107 struct sp_member_access {
00108         typedef T *type;
00109 };
00110 
00111 template <typename T>
00112 struct sp_member_access<T[]> {
00113         typedef void type;
00114 };
00115 
00116 template <typename T, std::size_t N>
00117 struct sp_member_access<T[N]> {
00118         typedef void type;
00119 };
00120 
00121 /* sp_array_access is a return type of operator[] */
00122 
00123 template <typename T>
00124 struct sp_array_access {
00125         typedef T &type;
00126 };
00127 
00128 template <typename T>
00129 struct sp_array_access<T[]> {
00130         typedef T &type;
00131 };
00132 
00133 template <typename T, std::size_t N>
00134 struct sp_array_access<T[N]> {
00135         typedef T &type;
00136 };
00137 
00138 /* sp_extent is used for operator[] index checking */
00139 
00140 template <typename T>
00141 struct sp_extent {
00142         enum _vt { value = 0 };
00143 };
00144 
00145 template <typename T, std::size_t N>
00146 struct sp_extent<T[N]> {
00147         enum _vt { value = N };
00148 };
00149 
00150 } /* namespace detail */
00151 
00152 } /* namespace nvml */
00153 
00154 #endif /* PMEMOBJ_SPECIALIZATION_HPP */
